Test Name: Vasculitis Antibody Screen with Reflex to ANCA
Purpose: To detect vasculitis-associated antibodies, including ANCA (anti-PR3 and anti-MPO), for accurate diagnosis and monitoring of vasculitis.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA or indirect immunofluorescence (IIF) setup with plate reader or fluorescence microscope, micropipettes
